@ImAGuest Dunno, sorry. I have a Greek keyboard installed instead. Easy if you know your way around QWERTY. Numpad code is supposed to be alt+234 though, according to Google. Haven't checked myself.
@DanteΩ you read my mind, bro. Cool is as cool do. Now, tell me something: what is the ashii code for "Ω"?

@ImAGuest Well, lucky for you, I do check on my comments for a while after making them. Also, I don't believe he implied what you said he did. He said, I quote, "Kinda confused by all the moral high ground comments of late". I assume he was referring to people like @harry17, who seems to have made an account just to state that he dislikes
two particular fetishes. That opinion doesn't exactly contribute to conversation does it? And the poke thing sounds neat, but it'd kinda take away from the whole vibe. TL;DR: Say what you like. But stop complaining about what other people like. Cool?
@1handfap agreed, and great story.....
Imaguest sure like typing...
dang it, with the fast repost I just realised Dante probably wont anserw me. A pity we can't send a poke or something to avvise for the reply.

@DanteΩ of course I get an eyefull of the comments before beginning to read the doujinshi. Dunno how many time I got burned with some not labeled NTR on fakku. And he simply implied that since we all are on a hentai site we cannot get to express our opinion. Now, while (as I already said) despise those who read a NTR while diskiling the genre I dislike even more those who try to block out other freedom to say whatever (non insulting nor insinuating) they want to say. So, in a NTR doujinshi comment session someone that flame the NTR genre just because then I totally dislike him. Unless the doujinshi is mislabeled or not labeled as NTR. In that case then I'm fully on his side. But when I see someone that try to shut down the voice of the others, just because we are in a hentai site (and basically Demytri said "shut the hell, you are in a hentai site, you can't complain") I snap
it's a hentai site, who cares, just shut the fuck up and read. nhentai doesn't have this much active before time.

@ImAGuest You don't have to like NTR, rape or mind break. You just ignore it. Only one on a horse here is you; "to control and get an eyeful of the comments". Really? Plus, what did @Demytri do to trigger you so bad?

@Demytri get you off your high horse. Simply because we are in a hentai site don't mean we automatically like the NTR, rape and mind break. I sure as hell despise those who dislike the genre and still read only to flame. THAT is being idiot. I personally enter every english relase ust to control and get an eyefull of the comment. So, get off your horse and make a mile or twenty. Maybe your head will get some oxigen down on heart.
Kinda confused by all the moral high ground comments as of late, check the site you're on and get off your horse.
